Name: Red Robin
About the game: \ HELP! / There is a place that seems invisible, no one can find it, and no signal can be sent from it. 'Red Bird' , tells of a stranger with endless problems in life and work on a rainy night. Because of an accidental car accident, accidentally found a deep forest where no one knew Houses. And this place seems to be very consistent with a thing he has recently known... About the game Plot-oriented pixel style game, the gameplay includes some elements such as exploration, puzzle solving, and collection Original art materials Double ending, and the content of the ending is completely different, the duration of a week is 2-3 hours Content-rich branch lines, some branch lines need to meet the collection conditions to open The operation method is recommended to use the z key to confirm and investigate, the x key to cancel and open the menu, the arrow keys ↑ ↓ → ←to move, the running arrow key +Shift, F4 full screen Some guides are visible in the local folder of the game.
